infos.value: ...Just as I feared. Those two were harbingers of misfortune.
Harbingers?
That's right.
Ever since we helped those women...
We keep getting tangled up with Rundall soldiers.
And what's wrong with that?
Every soldier we handle is one less adversity to befall those princesses... Right?
What do you mean, "Right‚Äù!?
If this continues, we'll be putting Chel in harm's way. You get that, don't you?
You needn't worry, for I am here.
I have the coolest brother ever!
...Who goes there!?
Ugh... She's back.
Whatever is the matter, princess? Unable to forget me, I presume?
Speaking of, I never properly introduced myself.
I'm Howlet. And these two are my younger brother Tyytas and little sister Chel.
I'm Viktora. Luartha was carried off by Rundall soldiers.
By Rundall soldiers...?
Alright, alright. That's enough.
Don't drag us into your confounded affairs.
...My apologies.
No, princess, there is no reason to apologize.
But I must ask, what are Rundall soldiers doing this far in Lykeros territory?
You haven't heard?
Rundall has won the war with Lykeros.
That's why no one remains in these parts to oppose them.
...I see. So they have free run of the place.
We can't leave bad guys to do whatever they want.
And so...where is Luartha, then?
Brother, you can't be serious... You can't!
Stop diving headfirst into trouble that doesn't involve you!
So you suggest abandoning the captive princess?
So you do understand me. Of course that's what I'm suggesting!
I saw it happen. She was taken away to Lykeros Castle.
Lykeros Castle, huh...
This is absurd.
You actually plan to invade the enemy's stronghold with just us?
Of course it would be downright foolish to try to waltz in through the front door.
Well, do you have some kind of plan, then?
We wait until nightfall.
Th-that's it!?
I'm not used to spending time with princesses outside the wee hours of the night.
Huh? Why's that?
I wonder if someone will come visit me at night once I'm an adult, too.
Hehehe. Though if someone does, I'll have to tear him limb from limb.
Brother, I'll have you know I'm fully opposed to this.
